name: T - Daughters Talk
_source: speak;Emma; Do I want to spend the evening with Noah, Noelle, and Layla?
choice;yes_no;Spend time with the married couple?;Yes,No;backable
speak;Emma; They look deep in thought...{w} I should leave them be tonight.
speak;Noah; Emma, come and join us.{w} My daughters and I were just taking in the starry sky.
speak;Emma; Nights like this do leave me quite speechless.
speak;Noelle; I wish I could fly to the stars{tgm}...
speak;Noelle; I'd pluck one out of the sky and bring it back for us.
speak;Layla; When you do, let me know.{w} I'm sure I'd find something good to use it for.{w} Some kind of strong potion or spell{tgm}...
speak;Noah; Layla, perhaps tonight you could not mention your{tgm}...
speak;Layla; My life's work?{w} No, I can't not think about it.
speak;Emma; Life's work?{w} You don't even look old enough to go into a bar on your own.
speak;Layla; I'm not old enough for you?!
speak;Layla; Fine then, how about you tell me about the intricacies of dark arts!{w} Or maybe you want to cast a spell for me?
speak;Layla; Come on, since you're the adult here!
speak;Emma; I-I didn't mean to suggest-
speak;Layla; That's right, because everyone belittles me for being a child until I challenge them.
speak;Noah; Layla, restrain yourself.{w} I'm sure Emma didn't mean to belittle you.
speak;Noah; I'm sorry, you must excuse me.{w} I have to make sure Layla doesn't do anything reckless in her anger.
speak;Noelle; I'm sorry about my sister.{w} She's quite{tgm}...{tgm} sensitive nowadays.
speak;Emma; But what's wrong with her?{w} I understand that nobody likes being called a child, but her anger{tgm}...

speak;Noelle; Yeah{tgm}...{tgm}I love Layla, but she's got a short fuse.{w} On her worst days, she makes it hard to care for her.{w} Don't get me wrong, Dad and I can be live wires ourselves,{w} but Layla crosses into blind fury much more often.
speak;Emma; How could you keep someone who hurts you so close, though?
speak;Noelle; You and your sister don't hurt each other sometimes?{w} Didn't seem that way to me.
speak;Emma; It would be better if we weren't that way, though{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Right?
speak;Noelle; It's because she's family.{w} I love her in spite of the pain.
speak;Emma; In spite of the pain{tgm}...
speak;Noelle; Hey, I should probably go after my sister.{w} If Dad can't calm her down, maybe I can do something.{w} For what it's worth, I enjoyed your company.{w} We should talk more.
speak;Emma; I'd love to as well.{w} I hope everything works out.
speak;Noelle; I'm sure a good night of sleep will reset her.{w} Sleep well, Emma!
speak;Emma; What an odd family...{w} I couldn't imagine Emily, Mom, and I like that...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
